name: Goddess (CapsuleMage)
description:
This is a demo of the first area of a RPG that I worked on for the itch.io "My First Game Jam. I've used the default assets for the time being, until I add my own assets.

Even though it's only just a tour of the world map, I'm proud of what I've made for this Jam!

My goal is to have this RPG length to be 5-10 hours, with a possibility of multiple endings.
